result.execSummary:
The defendant Sean A. Mayfield was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Sean A. Mayfield is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Sean A. Mayfield was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sean A. Mayfield

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Minutes:  15CM1253/15CM1308.  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Greg Bates.  Cases are resolved.  

15CM1253 - deft pleads guilty to count 1; found guilty by the Court.  deft sentenced to 2 days KCJ.  Credit for 2 days served.  Costs rolled into sentence.  Count 2 is dismissed on State's motion.

15CM1308 - deft pleads guilty to count 2; found guilty by the Court.  Deft sentenced to 26 days KCJ.  Credit for 26 days served.  Costs ordered; to be paid w/in 30 days.  In default, 8 days work crew or 8 days KCJ consec to mandatory sentences.      Remaining counts are dismissed on State's motion.

DNA ordered; notice given to deft.

Sentencing arguments made.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.  kmk
State's List of Witnesses and Demand for Discovery - filed by ADA, Jessica Krejcarek  kmk

Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 9, 2015 at 01:15 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for November 4, 2015 at 09:20 am.  Jury selection scheduled for November 23, 2015 at 09:00 am.  $2500  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).    jk
